# Title

> this is blockquote summary which extends far beyond 80 characters which meansmost formatters like `deno fmt` will wrap it over multiple lines that'sactually against the [llms.txt](https://llmstxt.org) spec
> most formatters like `deno fmt` will wrap it over multiple lines that's
> actually against the [llms.txt](https://llmstxt.org) spec
